io.netty.resolver

Class CompositeNameResolver<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.resolver.SimpleNameResolver<T>
      • io.netty.resolver.CompositeNameResolver<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NameResolver<T>, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class CompositeNameResolver<T>
extends SimpleNameResolver<T>
    A composite SimpleNameResolver that resolves a host name against a sequence of NameResolvers. In case of a failure, only the last one will be reported.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompositeNameResolver(EventExecutor executor, NameResolver<T>... resolvers) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void doResolve(String inetHost, Promise<T> promise)
      Invoked by SimpleNameResolver.resolve(String) to perform the actual name resolution.
      protected void doResolveAll(String inetHost, Promise<List<T>> promise)
      Invoked by SimpleNameResolver.resolveAll(String) to perform the actual name resolution.

      • Methods inherited from class io.netty.resolver.SimpleNameResolver

        close, executor, resolve, resolve, resolveAll, resolveAll

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompositeNameResolver

        public CompositeNameResolver(EventExecutor executor,
                     NameResolver<T>... resolvers)
        Parameters:
        executor - the EventExecutor which is used to notify the listeners of the Future returned by SimpleNameResolver.resolve(String)
        resolvers - the NameResolvers to be tried sequentially
